name: Dog Bed - Stripe in Yellow with Navy Binding
description:
(Medium Size $190)

(Large Size $215)


This listing is for the Stripe design in Yellow with Navy binding as pictured. The dog bed comes in 3 sizes or can be made to order. Made from 100% hemp canvas outer cover with a buckwheat filled insert to keep your pooch comfortable and happy while they sleep. Please see the "Comfort for Clive" link for more information. Please email me prior to purchase to confirm delivery option.

name: Cushion Cover - Coordinate pattern in Olive
description:
(50 x 30cm: $50)

(50 x 50cm: $70)


This listing is for the Olive Green print in the coordinate pattern. The cushion on the top of the two pictured. Made from a beautiful blended fabric of Hemp and Yak Hair. The fabric used in making these cushions is quite unique. It is a blend of soft natural fibres and the cushions really would make a beautiful addition to any home. All cushions are printed on both sides and have piping all the way around the edge to give a beautiful high quality finish. There is a zip along one edge to give easy access for inserts. 2 Sizes: 50cm x 50cm or 50cm x 30cm Cushions are sold without inserts but inserts of these sizes are readily available in retail stores For more information please see the "Elve link" or if you have any questions feel free to contact me.

name: Bean Bag in Pink Circles
description:
(Adult Size $180)


Different patterns and colours are available. Please email me for further details. Made from a 55% hemp and 45% organic cotton blend canvas these bean bags are tough and durable yet extremely comfortable to sit on or lye all over! The fabric is hand screen printed and easy to clean (cold machine wash). All bean bags come with an inner lining and both layers have child proof safety zips. For added convenience the bean bags all have a strap at the top for hanging up when not in use. Kids bags are approximately 65cm in diameter and 90cm in height. Adult bags are approximately 85cm in diameter and 130cm in height Beans are not included but can be purchased from shops such as Kmart, Target and Spotlight. Kids bean bags use approximately 100L of beans and adults approximately 250L. Turnaround time is approximately 3 weeks.

name: Floor Cushion - Round
description:
These floor cushions are awesome! They are big, super comfy and look fabulous. 

The cushions are made from a hemp and organic cotton blend canvas which is strong and durable yet extremely comfortable to sit on or lye all over! The fabric is hand screen printed and the inserts are made from crumbed foam, which is extremely comfortable to sit on and bounces back to keep its form.

They are approximately 84cm in diameter and 12cm in height.

<b>Please email me prior to purchase to confirm delivery option.<b/>

name: Dog Bed - Squares in Coral with Navy Binding
description:
This is a one off listing of a new dog bed design. The listing is for the Square design in Coral with Navy binding as pictured. The dog bed currently comes in one size (approximately 65cm x 65cm) but can be made to order. 

Made from 100% hemp canvas outer cover with a buckwheat filled insert to keep your pooch comfortable and happy while they sleep.

Please see the "Comfort for Clive" link for more information.

<b>Please email me prior to purchase to confirm delivery option.<b/>

name: Tea Towel
description:
Hand screen printed onto 100% Hemp. 

Hemp has excellent absorbency, anti-bacterial and anti-mildew properties which make it the perfect material for tea towels. The more you use them the more absorbent they become! 

Fabric is 100% hemp.
Size is approximately 50cm x 68cm.

Machine wash in cold water.
Warm iron on reverse side.

Tea Towels come in a choice of 3 colours: Duck Egg Blue, Eucalyptus Green and Stone. Colours may vary depending on your monitor.

Please contact me if you have any questions or would like to buy a pack of three coordinating designs or colours.

name: Adult Bean Bags
description:
(Kid Size $120)

(Adult Size $180)


Different patterns and colours are available. Please email me for further details. Bean bags can be made in any of my 3 geometric patterns and in any colour. Have a look through the images on my website to get a better idea of the combinations available and please email me with any requests. I can then setup a custom order for easy processing. name: Custom Made Dog Bed
description:
(Medium Size $190)

(Large Size $215)


Because we offer a wide variety of options in our "Comfort for Clive" dog bed range it is possible that we may not have the colour, size or design that you are wanting in stock...........don't despair! We make to order, and can usually have a custom made dog bed ready to go in approximately three weeks. (Please see my blog for more information on designs and colours) Please contact me with your requirements and we'll take it from there.

name: Set of 3 Tea Towels
description:
This listing is for a set of 3 Tea towels. Your choice of 3 can be made at left.

Hand screen printed onto 100% Hemp. 

Hemp has excellent absorbency, anti-bacterial and anti-mildew properties which make it the perfect material for tea towels. The more you use them the more absorbent they become! 

Fabric is 100% hemp.
Size is approximately 50cm x 68cm.

Machine wash in cold water.
Warm iron on reverse side.

Tea Towels come in a choice of 3 colours and 3 designs.
Colours: Duck Egg Blue, Eucalyptus Green and Stone. Colours may vary depending on your monitor.
Designs: Circles, Squares, Mixed circle and square pattern.

Please contact me if you have any questions.
